name: Cave In (PhilPhil)
description:
The cave is crumbling down, run your way to freedom! 

Made for the LOWREZJAM 2021.  

CONTROLS:

  • move using: a, w, d / j, i, l / or the arrow keys
  • esc: returns you to main menu from any menu
Title music: "Lady Bad Luck (VRC6)" by RoccoW Level music: "Tittle Screen" by sawsquarenoise
